Literature.Title: Opossum Cathelicidins Exhibit Antimicrobial Activity Against a Broad Spectrum of Pathogens Including West Nile Virus
Literature.Author: Cho HS, Yum J, Larivière A, Lévêque N, Le QVC, Ahn B, Jeon H, Hong K, Soundrarajan N, Kim JH, Bodet C, Park C

Literature.Title: Bactericidal activities and biochemical features of 16 antimicrobial peptides against bovine-mastitis causative pathogens
Literature.Author: Cho HS, Kim D, Jeon H, Somasundaram P, Soundrarajan N, Park C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:5% Cytotoxicity=16 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:11% Cytotoxicity=32-64 µg/ml,Human Primary Epidermal Keratinocytes (HEK):0% Cytotoxicity=16-32 µg/ml,Human Primary Epidermal Keratinocytes (HEK):11% Cytotoxicity=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>32µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(0-10% Cytotoxicity=16-64µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 27956(MIC=13.2µM),Streptococcus dysgalactiae subsp. dysgalactiae ATCC 27957(MIC=13.2µM),Streptococcus equi subsp. zooepidemicus ATCC 43079(MIC=13.2µM)
